languages.text: "Если вознести с командного трона люминодиакона литанию запуска энергетических установок, Движущая сила, рождаемая благословенным реактором, будет направлена в зал. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервитор-распределитель{/g} удерживает ее объем в заданных параметрах, но, получив приказ увеличить мощность до предельной, он превратит это место в электрическую ловушку".

traits.locale_text: "Если вознести с командного трона люминодиакона литанию запуска энергетических установок, Движущая сила, рождаемая благословенным реактором, будет направлена в зал. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервитор-распределитель{/g} удерживает ее объем в заданных параметрах, но, получив приказ увеличить мощность до предельной, он превратит это место в электрическую ловушку".

languages.text: "Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."
languages.original_text: "Если вознести с командного трона люминодиакона литанию запуска энергетических установок, Движущая сила, рождаемая благословенным реактором, будет направлена в зал. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервитор-распределитель{/g} удерживает ее объем в заданных параметрах, но, получив приказ увеличить мощность до предельной, он превратит это место в электрическую ловушку".

traits.locale_text: "Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

"Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

"Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

"Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

"Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

languages.text: "Durch eine Litanei der Inbetriebnahme für die Energieeinheiten des Kommandothrons des Lumenodiakons wird die vom gesegneten Reaktor erzeugte Antriebskraft in die Halle umgeleitet. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Distributionsservitor{/g} hält seine Leistungsausgabe innerhalb der vorgegebenen Parameter. Wenn er jedoch einen Befehl erhält, die Leistung auf den Maximalwert zu erhöhen, verwandelt er diesen Raum in eine elektrische Falle."
languages.original_text: "Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

traits.locale_text: "Durch eine Litanei der Inbetriebnahme für die Energieeinheiten des Kommandothrons des Lumenodiakons wird die vom gesegneten Reaktor erzeugte Antriebskraft in die Halle umgeleitet. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Distributionsservitor{/g} hält seine Leistungsausgabe innerhalb der vorgegebenen Parameter. Wenn er jedoch einen Befehl erhält, die Leistung auf den Maximalwert zu erhöhen, verwandelt er diesen Raum in eine elektrische Falle."

languages.text: « Réciter une litanie d'activation des unités d'alimentation à partir du trône de commandement du luminodiacre devrait rediriger la Force Motrice créée par le saint réacteur vers la salle. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor de distribution{/g} maintient sa production dans les limites des paramètres définis, mais s'il reçoit l'ordre de l'augmenter à ses valeurs maximales, il transformera cet endroit en véritable piège électrique. »
languages.original_text: "Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

traits.locale_text: « Réciter une litanie d'activation des unités d'alimentation à partir du trône de commandement du luminodiacre devrait rediriger la Force Motrice créée par le saint réacteur vers la salle. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor de distribution{/g} maintient sa production dans les limites des paramètres définis, mais s'il reçoit l'ordre de l'augmenter à ses valeurs maximales, il transformera cet endroit en véritable piège électrique. »

languages.text: “我们可以通过通明助祭的指挥宝座，为动力装置诵念启动祷文，将神圣反应堆创造的源力接入其中。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}传输机仆{/g}负责将电力输出保持在设定的参数范围内，但如果它接收到提高峰值的命令，就可以把这个大厅变成电闪雷鸣的陷阱。”
languages.original_text: "Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以通过通明助祭的指挥宝座，为动力装置诵念启动祷文，将神圣反应堆创造的原初动力接入其中。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}传输奴工{/g}负责将电力输出保持在设定的参数范围内，但如果它接收到提高峰值的命令，就可以把这个大厅变成电闪雷鸣的陷阱。”

languages.text: 「ルーメン助祭のコマンドスローンから電源ユニットに稼働の連祷を唱えれば、祝福されたリアクターが生む動力をホールに向けられる。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}分配サーヴィター{/g}は設定されたパラメータ内でそのまま出力するが、ピーク値を超える命令を受けると、この場所に電気の罠を張り巡らせるのです」
languages.original_text: "Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

traits.locale_text: 「ルーメン助祭のコマンドスローンから動力装置に稼働の連祷を唱えれば、祝福されたリアクターが生む動力をホールに向けられる。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}分配サーヴィター{/g}は、設定されたパラメータ内でそのまま出力するが、ピーク値を超える命令を受けると、この場所に電気の罠を張り巡らせるのだ」

languages.text: «Pronunciar una Letanía de Actuación para las unidades de potencia desde el trono de mando del lumidiácono dirigirá la Fuerza Motriz creada por el reactor bendito hacia la sala. El {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor de distribución{/g} está manteniendo su salida dentro de los parámetros establecidos, pero al recibir la orden de aumentarla a valores máximos, convertirá este lugar en una trampa eléctrica».
languages.original_text: "Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

traits.locale_text: «Pronunciar una Letanía de Actuación para las unidades de potencia desde el trono de mando del lumidiácono dirigirá la Fuerza Motriz creada por el reactor bendito hacia la sala. El {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor de distribución{/g} está manteniendo su salida dentro de los parámetros establecidos, pero al recibir la orden de aumentarla a valores máximos, convertirá este lugar en una trampa eléctrica».

languages.text: "Lümendiyakozun komuta tahtındaki güç üniteleri için bir Hareket İlahisi söylenmesi, kutsanmış reaktörün ürettiği Devinim Gücü'nü salona yönlendirecektir. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Dağıtım hizmetörü{/g} bu üretimi, belirlenen parametre aralığında tutuyor. Lakin azami değere çıkma emri almasıyla birlikte, tüm bu salonu elektrikli bir tuzağa çevirecektir."
languages.original_text: "Uttering a Litany of Actuation for the power units from the lumenodeacon's command throne will direct the Motive Force created by the blessed reactor into the hall. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}distribution servitor{/g} is keeping its output within the set parameters, but upon receiving an order to increase it to peak values, it will turn this place into an electric trap."

traits.locale_text: "Lümendiyakozun komuta tahtındaki güç ünitelerinin, salondaki kutsanmış reaktörün ürettiği Devinim Gücü'nü yönlendirmesi için bir Hareket İlahisi söylemek. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Dağıtım servitörü{/g}, üretimi belirlenen parametre aralığında tutuyor. Lakin azami değere çıkma emri almasıyla birlikte tüm bu salonu elektrikli bir tuzağa çevirecek."
